snippet.title: Puppy Chef Academy - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Puppy Chef Academy is a Virtual Reality cooking experience designed to help you learn how to cook without the stress and mess of a real kitchen. The game blends the simple controls of Job Simulator with the innovative gameplay of Cooking Mama, with a splash of visual novel storytelling. Throughout your adventure you’ll cook tasty recipes, learn about cooking, and even make some friends along the way!

You play as Yuu, the first cat to be accepted into the all-dog Puppy Chef Academy, a culinary school where aspiring candidates enter as students and leave as culinary masters. Get ready to don your apron and chef hat: With the help of the teachers you meet and friends you make, you’ll be on your way to achieving your dreams of becoming a master chef!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/921520/Puppy_Chef_Academy/
Itch.io: https://ctneptune.itch.io/puppy-chef-academy
